titleStmt.title: A frendly larum, or faythfull warnynge to the true harted subiectes of England Discoueryng the actes, and malicious myndes of those obstinate and rebellious papists that hope (as they terme it) to haue theyr golden day. By I. Phil.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, John, fl. 1570-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetstreete by William How: for Rycharde Iohnes,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A friendly larum for true English subiectes.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
